casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Adam Richard CAREY 293A19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 5, 2019

Guy J. Loranger, Attorney at Law, For Carey, Adam Richard

E. Burke Haywood, Special Deputy Attorney General, For State of North Carolina

Ernie Lee, District Attorney, For State of North Carolina

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 2nd of August 2019 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of August 2019."
